timeline.bodyText: nit-picking here: perhaps use "earn a very snazzy T-shirt"  instead of "win" ? Feels a bit like having a low chance to actually end up with a price.
timeline.author: barthanssens
timeline.diffHunk: @@ -0,0 +1,19 @@ +--- +title: "Join us for Hacktoberfest 2020" +date: 2020-09-28T09:00:00+10:00 +layout: "single" +categories: ["news"] +--- + + + + +Hacktoberfest is a yearly event, a celebration of open source software, put together by DigitalOcean, to encourage people to start contributing to open source software. We would like to encourage you to [sign up and take part](https://hacktoberfest.digitalocean.com/)! + + + +The idea is that you contribute to an open source project, any open source project, by submitting a Pull Request (PR) to that project. If your PRs are accepted, you can win a very snazzy T-shirt, or if you prefer you can opt to plant a tree instead. See the [Hactoberfest sign up page](https://hacktoberfest.digitalocean.com/) for more details.

replies.bodyText: Yeah, good point actually, thanks, will fix!
replies.author: jeenbroekstra

timeline.message: GH-2540 win -> earn and rephrased requirements slightly
